mapper.select: SELECT MEMNO AS "no", NAME AS "name", ID AS "id", PW AS "pw", ADDR AS "addr", TEL AS "tel" FROM MEMBER

select it.content as "content", it.itemno as "no", it.title as "title", it.artist as "artist", im.url as "img" ,it.price as "price", to_char(it.ldate,'YYYYMMDD') as "ldate" from item it inner join image im on it.itemno = im.itemno where it.itemno between 1 and 5 order by it.itemno asc

SELECT C.CARTNO AS "cartNo", C.MEMNO AS "memNo", C.ITEMNO AS "itemNo", C.COUNT AS "count", IT.PRICE AS "price", C.COUNT * IT.PRICE AS "totalPrice", IT.ARTIST AS "artist", IT.TITLE AS "title",IM.URL AS "img" FROM CART C INNER JOIN ITEM IT ON C.ITEMNO = IT.ITEMNO INNER JOIN IMAGE IM ON IT.ITEMNO = IM.ITEMNO WHERE MEMNO = #{searchNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE TEMP SET TEMP_NO=#{no}, TEMP_NAME=#{name}, TEMP_DESC=#{desc}, DEL_YN=#{delYn} WHERE TEMP_NO=#{rowNum}
mapper.select: select it.content as "content", it.itemno as "no", it.title as "title", it.artist as "artist",im.url as "img" ,it.price as "price", to_char(it.ldate,'YYYYMMDD') as "ldate" from item it inner join image im on it.itemno = im.itemno where it.title like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or it.artist like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' and it.itemno between 1 and 5 order by it.itemno asc
